message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $9,500 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down a little further to $9,800, but this is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose $9,600 for the product.
Bob, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to go down to $9,700, but I can't go any lower. If you're serious about this deal, I encourage you to accept this offer.
Alice, I'm glad we're narrowing down the price. I'm willing to pay $9,650 for the product.
Bob, I'm starting to think this deal isn't going to work. My final offer is $9,700. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to move on.
